claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: Flowchart outlining influenza vaccination dosing recommendations for children (determining whether a child received ≥2 doses of trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022, leading to either 1 dose or 2 doses of 2022–23 vaccine) The image shows a pediatric influenza vaccine dosing algorithm and contains no information regarding Flublok production methods, recombinant HA expression in insect cells, or use of a baculovirus expression vector system, so it does not support the claim

detailed_analysis.image_description: Flowchart outlining influenza vaccination dosing recommendations for children (determining whether a child received ≥2 doses of trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022, leading to either 1 dose or 2 doses of 2022–23 vaccine)
